title: Fanaka Gardens
description: Discover the allure of coastal living on this exquisite plot in Malindi, Kilifi County. Encompassing about 0.125 acres of sandy soil perfect for tropical gardens, it boasts stunning proximity to pristine beaches and the Indian Ocean. Easy access to Malindi Airport, vibrant markets, and luxury resorts ensures convenience. Ideal for a seaside villa or lucrative investment in Kenya's booming tourism hub, where azure waters meet endless possibilities.
